author: bloritsch
msg: Cocoon uses the AvalonAware.jar file to provide all the required interfaces
that Avalon provides.  These comprise everything that used to belong
to org.apache.arch.* and org.apache.cocoon.Parameters.  The only
file.  For some reason that is the only class that does not compile.
I will verify the AvalonAware.jar again at work, but the two things that
it complains of exist in the class.  ?!?
